Senegalese presidential candidate arrested near election protestSenegalese security forces detained presidential candidate Anta Babacar Ngom on Sunday near a protest against the postponement of the Feb. 25 election, her campaign manager told Reuters. Sun, 04 Feb 2024 17:32:07 GMT APKYE4O4OJIRDCHEK4F73P6ISY https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/senegalese-presidential-candidate-arrested-near-election-protest-2024-02-04/Reuters世界非洲
Canada to sanction West Bank settlers and Hamas leadersCanada will impose sanctions on Israeli settlers who incite violence in the West Bank and introduce new sanctions on Hamas leaders, Foreign Minister Melanie Joly said on Sunday, after the United States took similar action last week. Sun, 04 Feb 2024 17:09:29 GMT STUIB5HDIBJAVFFLPYLQUZUZGE https://www.reuters.com/world/canada-sanction-west-bank-settlers-hamas-leaders-minister-2024-02-04/Reuters世界
Chile president laments 'tragedy' as wildfires kill 64; toll expected to riseHundreds of people have been reported missing, and more than 1,000 homes have been damaged. Sun, 04 Feb 2024 16:44:50 GMT KHTIIRISIVOBJKLWRSWCUK2JOQ https://www.reuters.com/business/environment/chile-president-says-wildfires-death-toll-jumps-64-likely-rise-2024-02-04/Reuters商业环境
Canada extends ban on foreign ownership of housing by two yearsCanada on Sunday announced a two-year extension to a ban on foreign ownership of Canadian housing, saying the step was aimed at addressing worries about Canadians being priced out of housing markets in cities and towns across the country. Sun, 04 Feb 2024 16:17:16 GMT ZGYY2ALH4RKR3JL57OLX4TG62E https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/canada-extends-ban-foreign-ownership-housing-by-two-years-2024-02-04/Kanishka Singh世界美洲
Iraq bans 8 local banks from US dollar transactionsIraq has banned eight local commercial banks from engaging in U.S. dollar transactions, taking action to reduce fraud, money laundering and other illegal uses of U.S. currency days after a visit by a top U.S. Treasury official. Sun, 04 Feb 2024 15:42:35 GMT 4E7A74B4W5PPRMQ4I6OO3N2RNI https://www.reuters.com/business/finance/iraq-bans-8-local-banks-us-dollar-transactions-2024-02-04/Timour Azhari商业金融
US plans more strikes in Middle East against Iran-backed groupsThe United States plans to undertake further strikes after the killing of three U.S. troops by Iranian-backed militias last weekend, White House National Security Adviser Jake Sullivan said on Sunday. Sun, 04 Feb 2024 14:27:21 GMT HGGKOEMOMVPGJLZ3JXQJOD6R74 https://www.reuters.com/world/gaza-人道主义-issues-will-be-top-blinken-priority-white-houses-sullivan-says-2024-02-04/Reuters世界
Zelenskiy visits front line, army chief's future in questionPresident Volodymyr Zelenskiy visited Ukrainian troops on the southeastern front and handed out medals, his office said on Sunday amid intense speculation that his popular army chief could soon be sacked. Sun, 04 Feb 2024 13:12:05 GMT 2EKOJSAEKZPKBI5R6LYHDREQIM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/zelenskiy-visits-front-line-amid-speculation-about-fate-top-general-2024-02-04/Reuters世界欧洲
Gaza doctor describes ordeal of detentionA Palestinian doctor says Israeli forces in Gaza detained him when they overran a hospital and subjected him to abuse during 45 days of captivity including sleep deprivation and constant shackling and blindfolding before releasing him last week. Sun, 04 Feb 2024 12:10:24 GMT兰奇57HJNOHFBG2NIK45NF5RA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/gaza-doctor-describes-ordeal-detention-2024-02-04/Bassam Masoud, Ibraheemabu Mustafa世界中东
El Salvador President Bukele poised for a landslide as voters cast ballotsSalvadorans voted on Sunday in elections expected to hand President Nayib Bukele another landslide victory, with many happy to overlook the young leader's authoritarian drift after he crushed gang violence that had paralyzed life in the poor Central American country. Sun, 04 Feb 2024 12:03:37 GMT OXDOOR2WGJPKLCNYW7LXZHXJ34 https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/el-salvador-president-bukele-poished-another-landslide-voters-head-polls-2024-02-04/Nelson Renteria, Sarah Kinosian世界美洲
Hamas hounds Israeli forces in main Gaza citiesPalestinian gunmen kept up attacks against Israeli forces on Sunday in the Gaza Strip's two main cities, weeks after they were overrun by troops and tanks, in a sign Hamas still maintains some control ahead of any potential truce. Sun, 04 Feb 2024 11:45:45 GMT 3PTXKNJQGZJCREG57MUNR7SJVM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/hamas-hounds-israeli-forces-main-gaza-cities-2024-02-04/Nidal Al-Mughrabi, Bassam Masoud, Dan Williams世界中东
US intends further strikes on Iran-backed groups, national security adviser saysThe United States and Britain unleashed attacks against 36 Houthi targets in Yemen, a day after the U.S. military hit Tehran-backed groups in Iraq and Syria in retaliation for a deadly attack on U.S. troops in Jordan. Sun, 04 Feb 2024 10:56:52 GMT 7Y3ALGRAQVJZJJCV7W7C63ULAE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/yemens-houthis-vow-response-after-us-british-strikes-2024-02-04/Phil Stewart, Idrees Ali, Mohammed Ghobari, Timour Azhari世界中东
